mapper.select: SELECT pb.buy_amount as budget_amount, pb.buy_amount - ifnull(tp.order_total_amount_tax,0) as remain_amount FROM proj_base pb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT prm.project_id, sum( prm.order_total_amount_tax ) AS order_total_amount_tax FROM purchase_request_main prm WHERE prm.req_type = '0' AND prm.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY prm.project_id ) tp on pb.id = tp.project_id WHERE pb.id = #{query.projId}

select pbm.*, bm.code, bm.spe_type, pc.name as category_name, sdi.item_text as unit_name from project_bom_relation pbm inner join bas_material bm on pbm.material_id = bm.id inner join project_category pc on pbm.category_id = pc.id left join sys_dict_item sdi ON bm.unit_id = sdi.item_value and sdi.dict_id = ( select sd.id from sys_dict sd where sd.dict_code = 'unit' ) where pbm.del_flag = '0' and pbm.proj_id = #{query.id}
